summary.span: 描述由矩形和路徑構成的圖形形狀內部。

span.span: Describes the interior of a graphics shape composed of rectangles and paths.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區域是可擴充的因為全局座標中指定其座標。A region is scalable because its coordinates are specified in world coordinates. 在 繪圖介面，不過，它的內部會相依於的大小和形狀像素為單位，代表它。On a drawing surface, however, its interior is dependent on the size and shape of the pixels representing it. 應用程式可以使用區域來裁剪繪圖作業的輸出。An application can use regions to clip the output of drawing operations. 這些區域稱為裁剪區域。These regions are called clipping regions. 如需有關使用裁剪區域的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用與區域的裁剪](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md)。For more information on using regions for clipping, see [How to: Use Clipping with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md). 應用程式也可以使用中的點擊測試的作業，例如檢查點或矩形交集區域的區域。An application can also use regions in hit-testing operations, such as checking whether a point or a rectangle intersects a region. 如需有關如何使用區域的點擊測試的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用點擊測試與區域](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md)。For more information on using regions for hit-testing, see [How to: Use Hit Testing with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md). 應用程式可能會填滿區域使用方法和物件。An application can fill a region by using the method and a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼範例示範如何使用從其中一個物件來設定另。The code example demonstrates how to use the from one object to set the for another . remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範建構函式和和方法。The following code example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`FillRegionExcludingPath`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `FillRegionExcludingPath` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形，並繪製至以藍色畫面。Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue. - 建立從矩形的區域。Creates a region from the rectangle. - 建立的轉換矩陣，並將它設定為 45 度。Creates a transformation matrix and sets it to 45 degrees. - 會將轉換套用至區域。Applies the transformation to the region. - 紅色中填入已轉換的地區，並以紅色螢幕繪製轉換。Fills the transformed region with red and draws the transformed region to the screen in red. 請注意，紅色矩形會從原始的矩形中，以藍色顯示旋轉 45 度。Notice that the red rectangle is rotated 45 degrees from the original rectangle, shown in blue.
